meanings.definition: Adapted to a narrow range of depths.
meanings.sent1: The stenobathic fish prefers to stay in specific depths of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The stenobathic creatures are well-suited for living in a limited depth range.
meanings.sent3: The stenobathic diver only explores the shallow parts of the sea.
meanings.sent4: Her stenobathic nature kept her anchored to the same depth of emotions.
meanings.sent5: The stenobathic habitat of the coral reef is carefully maintained by nature.

meanings.definition: Living or able to live within a narrow range of depths.
meanings.sent1: Many stenobathic species thrive in the specific depth zones of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The stenobathic organisms have adapted to survive in a limited depth range.
meanings.sent3: The stenobathic explorer only dares to venture into the shallow waters.
meanings.sent4: His stenobathic lifestyle kept him content within a narrow range of experiences.
meanings.sent5: The stenobathic fisherman knew exactly where to find the prized catch at a specific depth.
